com.pddstudio.networkutils

Class DiscoveryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pddstudio.networkutils.DiscoveryService

  • public class DiscoveryService
extends java.lang.Object
    A Service for looking up several discovery types (Avahi/Bonjour/Zeroconf) on a network.

    • Method Detail

      • startDiscovery

        public void startDiscovery(java.lang.String serviceType,
                  DiscoveryCallback discoveryCallback)
        Start looking up for the provided discovery type. The results will be sent to the provided DiscoveryCallback.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - - The discovery type to look for.
        discoveryCallback - - The callback interface.

      • startDiscovery

        public void startDiscovery(DiscoveryType discoveryType,
                  DiscoveryCallback discoveryCallback)
        Start looking up for the provided DiscoveryType. The results will be sent to the provided DiscoveryCallback.
        Parameters:
        discoveryType - - The discovery type to look for.
        discoveryCallback - - The callback interface.

      • stopDiscovery

        public void stopDiscovery()
        Stops the service to lookup for network devices with the given service type.
